item.name: Steinborner Family Vineyards
item.description: Steinborner Family Vineyards is owned and operated by David and Rebecca Reynolds and Rebeccas parents, Michael and Heather Steinborner. Their Ancestry Vineyards are located on the floor of the Barossa Valley in Vine Vale. Shiraz (some 80 years old) accounts for two-thirds of the total plantings, with equal quantities of marsanne, viognier, durif and semillon making up the rest. Exports to Switzerland, Indonesia, Hong Kong, Singapore, China and Japan.
